#summary Plugins by others that are not hosted here
#labels Phase-Support

= Introduction =

We are not the be all and end all of DXCore plugins.
Others have written some and publish them on their own sites

= Details =
  * Oliver Sturm
    * [http://www.sturmnet.org/blog/2005/04/24/cr-electric-editing Electric Editing] - Based on !CodeRush, I created a plugin that lets me use some of the "electric" features I remember from Emacs: hungry delete and backspace and automatic newline insertion for the semicolon and the opening and closing curly braces.
    * [http://www.sturmnet.org/blog/2008/10/16/instant-gratification-for-developers Instant Gratification] - With this plugin installed, every time you build a project successfully Visual Studio will sing your praise.
  * Andrew Connell
    * [http://www.andrewconnell.com/blog/articles/ProductivityToolsForSharePointDevelopers.aspx VS CodeRush/Refactor Tools for SharePoint Developers]
  * Travis Illig
    * [http://cr-documentor.googlecode.com CR_Documentor] - Allows you to preview your XML documentation comments as they'll be rendered in compiled help.
    * [http://cr-codetweet.googlecode.com CR_CodeTweet] - Select some code in VS, right click, and send a link to that snippet on Twitter.
  * Steven Rasmussen
    * [http://community.devexpress.com/forums/p/95376/327744.aspx#327744 ] - Change the target framework of your project or solution.
